name: sternal fracture
description: A sternal fracture refers to a break or crack in the breastbone, typically resulting from direct trauma to the chest. adiological imaging such as X-rays or CT scans is utilized to visualize and assess the extent of the sternal injury, aiding in diagnosis and determining appropriate management strategies

values.name: indeterminate
values.description: cannot determine whether sternal fracture is present

values.name: unknown
values.description: uncertainty regarding the presence of sternal fracture

attributes.name: location
attributes.description: The anatomical region of the sternal fracture
